channel.title: Mods unable to trade
channel.description: hai ive been searching through the server tuts for about 20 mins now.. cant find nothing but too lazy to search any longer :P this should be a whole lot faster anyways so umm.. how would i make it to were my mods can no longer trade?

item.title: Mods unable to trade
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Mental Piracy, post:9, topic:393709”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=490895.msg3589551#msg3589551 date=1304477107]

haha i fixed um also do you know how i would block certain items from mods spawning?

Remove item spawning altogether. You can’t trust anyone.
[/quote]
Since he wants to know how, i suppose it couldnt hurt to show him, regardless of it being right or wrong.

You could add a simple if statement before your spawning command that checks if the entered item is in an array of blocked IDs before spawning. Would look something like this

int blocked[] = { add blocked item ids here }; for(int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) { if(blocked[i] == id) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You tried to spawn a blocked item"); return; } else { spawn code here } }
Its just a snippit, but if you know enough java to even be running a server, you can figure it out from there.[/quote]

Unless you know the blocked [] will be at least 10000, it should be replaced with blocked.length; Otherwise you will get something like an InvalidArrayIndexException (I can’t remember the error exactly).

Read full topic

item.title: Mods unable to trade
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:7, topic:393709”][quote author=scenemo link=topic=490895.msg3589537#msg3589537 date=1304476256]
haha i fixed um also do you know how i would block certain items from mods spawning?
[/quote]

Remove item spawning altogether. You can’t trust anyone.[/quote]
Since he wants to know how, i suppose it couldnt hurt to show him, regardless of it being right or wrong.

You could add a simple if statement before your spawning command that checks if the entered item is in an array of blocked IDs before spawning. Would look something like this

int blocked[] = { add blocked item ids here }; for(int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) { if(blocked[i] == id) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You tried to spawn a blocked item"); return; } else { spawn code here } }
Its just a snippit, but if you know enough java to even be running a server, you can figure it out from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods unable to trade
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

scenemo:

hai ive been searching through the server tuts for about 20 mins now… cant find nothing but too lazy to search any longer this should be a whole lot faster anyways so umm… how would i make it to were my mods can no longer trade?

Go into the trade method, and then add

if (playerRights == 1) {
    sendMessage("You are a moderater and cannot trade.");
}
else {
    // rest of code here.
}

Read full topic
